text: Marcel Denis (31 January 1896 - 16 June 1953) was a French long-distance runner. He competed in the marathon at the 1928 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1896 births Category:1953 deaths Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1928 Summer Olympics Category:French male long- distance runners Category:French male marathon runners Category:Olympic athletes of France Category:Place of birth missing
title: Marcel Denis (athlete)
